price: 以前他们与安拉确已约定，他们绝不转背。安拉的盟约，是应该负责履行的。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَانُواْ عَٰهَدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ ٱللَّهِ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kānū ʿāhadū al-laha min qablu lā yuwallūna al-adbāra wakāna ʿahdu al-lahi masūlan
